ComicInfo.Title: A Rogues' Gallery of Roman Emperors; The Vampire of Hanover; Basil the Bulgar Slayer; Gilles de Rais; Blackbeard; H. H. Holmes and His Murder Castle; The Sawney Beane Family; Architect of the "Final Solution"; Josef Stalin; The Last Shah; Pol Pot and the Killing Fields of Cambodia; Romania's Bloody Leader; Moriarty: Professor of Crime; Modred the Baddest Seed; Long John Silver; Kurtz's Law; Dracula; Simon LeGree; Lady Macbeth; Spanish Inquisition; Salem Witch Hunt; Joshua II's Bride of Christ Church; The Klansmen; Genocide in Armenia; McCarthyism; Mao's Cultural Revolution; The Guru of Gas; Militarism in Japan; Alchemy; Man Will Never Fly!; Dead Scientist's Society; Hollow Earth Theories; Phrenology; Sir Francis Galton; Nasal Sex; Immanuel Velikovsky; Roger Babson; Lysenkoism; The Stimoceiver; In Search of Ancient Astronauts; Biosphere 2; Bio-War Experiments; Nuclear Power; Mike Tyson; Ty Cobb; Pro Rasslin'; The Great Hoops Heist of '72; Charlie Hustle; Sports Bigotry; The Wide World of Spits; Disaster Movies; The Schlock That Refused to Die; The Pope of Trash; On Time & Sober; Porno Chic; The Wizard of Ooze; Practice, Practice, Practice; Flava o' da Month; The Proof Is in the Painting; Jeff Koons; Mass Market Angst; The American Dream; Capital of Kitsch; Pocket Monsters
